· GO! Express International Partners reporting

· Implemented dynamic dashboards in a performance-optimized manner.

· Perform all tasks individually as well as in team.
· Involved in Different Qlik Application Performance Tuning Strategies to create specific Optimizations and In turn keep my team ahead and praiseworthy.

· Appreciation for initiating concept of weekly QUIZ based on project work and Qlik technology among team. I believe quizzes are the best way to keep each member updated in a form of play.

Project Description:  GOOGLE HOTEL-ADS  
Project Objective – To make the Dashboard of the hotels present on the Google Search Engine with the filters 

as per the client requirement and Ad-hoc weekly and monthly report.  

Insight – Google LLC is an American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related 

services and products, which include online advertising, search engine and hardware etc. And it always aims to 

enhance the user experience of its search results. And particularly this project Google Hotel-Ads is related to the 

analysis of hotels ads business. And through this business, Google charge its customer (advertisers) by posting 

their product, service or event ads on different hotels clusters as per the geographical area. This project also 

helps in improving user experience in search results related to Hotels.  

Different Reports: -Hotels with maximum number of visits on their Google-Cluster ID. -Current Status

their type. - Categorization of Hotels on the basis of Parent Chain and Child Chain.
